name: Demolition Express
description:
Demolition Express was made by a small team of students at MSU in the MI 455 program.

It is a prototype to demonstrate a game concept.

Using the crew members on the cart, launch into the air and then shoot at the building with the rocket launchers that crew members are holding. Destroy the building to earn points!

To reset the stage, press "R."
Left click to launch off of cart and also shoot rockets.
Right click to slow down time while in the air, you only get 3!!! (Indicator on UI on type left)

Barrels explode!

As this is a prototype, please be mindful of any bugs.
